data.Name: SkySails
data.About:
Winds at high altitudes provide abundantly more energy than winds at surface level. Thus the use of energy-rich high-altitude winds represents the next generation of wind power. Large and fully automated kites are the key technology through which energy can be generated from high-altitude winds.

SkySails is the market and technology leader in the field of automated towing kite systems and the first company in the world that has succeeded in developing kite technology into an industrial application. The companies’ business splits into four segments all centered around its’ core technology.
